## About Me

I am an adjunct professor with the Computer and Information Science (CISC) Department at Fordham University.

I also work for Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL, "The Lab") as my day job on the HPC team.

My interests are in:

- Mathematics, High Performance Computing (HPC)
- Quantum Computing, Scientific Software
- DevOps, MLOps
- Software packaging, Containerization
- Privacy Preseseving Machine Learning
